Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Enums
  • Deprecated Exceptions
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    org.bonitasoft.engine.bpm.flownode.impl.FlowElementContainerDefinition
    since 6.2.3
    org.bonitasoft.engine.bpm.flownode.impl.HumanTaskDefinition
    since 6.2.3
  • Deprecated Enums 
    Enum and Description
    org.bonitasoft.engine.operation.LeftOperandType
  • Deprecated Exceptions 
    Exceptions and Description
    org.bonitasoft.engine.expression.ExpressionException
    As of 6.0 not thrown anymore
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.bonitasoft.engine.api.ProcessRuntimeAPI.addComment(long, String)
    use ProcessRuntimeAPI.addProcessComment(long, String) instead, that can throw CreationException is case of inexistant Process Instance
    org.bonitasoft.engine.api.ProcessManagementAPI.deleteProcess(long)
    As of release 6.1, replaced by ProcessManagementAPI.deleteProcessDefinition(long)
    org.bonitasoft.engine.api.ProcessManagementAPI.deleteProcesses(List)
    As of release 6.1, replaced by ProcessManagementAPI.deleteProcessDefinitions(List)
    org.bonitasoft.engine.api.ProcessRuntimeAPI.deleteProcessInstances(long)
    As of release 6.1, replaced by ProcessRuntimeAPI.deleteProcessInstances(long, int, int) and ProcessRuntimeAPI.deleteArchivedProcessInstances(long, int, int). As these new methods are paginated, to delete ALL archived and non-archived process instances, use some code like: 
     
    
 long nbDeleted = 0;
 processAPI.disableProcess(processDefinitionId);
 do {
     nbDeleted = processAPI.deleteProcessInstances(processDefinitionId, 0, 100);
 } while (nbDeleted > 0);
 do {
     nbDeleted = processAPI.deleteArchivedProcessInstances(processDefinitionId, 0, 100);
 } while (nbDeleted > 0);
    org.bonitasoft.engine.api.ProcessManagementAPI.disableAndDelete(long)
    As of release 6.1, replaced by ProcessManagementAPI.disableAndDeleteProcessDefinition(long)
    org.bonitasoft.engine.api.PlatformCommandAPI.get(String)
    As of release 6.2.1, replaced by PlatformCommandAPI.getCommand(String) that does not throw CreationException.
    org.bonitasoft.engine.bpm.process.DesignProcessDefinition.getActors()
    As of release 6.1, replaced by DesignProcessDefinition.getActorsList()
    org.bonitasoft.engine.api.ProcessRuntimeAPI.getComments(long)
    use paginated version ProcessRuntimeAPI.searchComments(SearchOptions) instead, passing a filter on processInstanceId field.
    org.bonitasoft.engine.operation.LeftOperand.getDataName()
    As of 6.0 replaced by LeftOperand.getName()
    org.bonitasoft.engine.operation.impl.LeftOperandImpl.getDataName()
    As of 6.0 replaced by LeftOperandImpl.getName()
    org.bonitasoft.engine.bpm.flownode.FlowElementContainerDefinition.getGateways()
    As of release 6.1, replaced by FlowElementContainerDefinition.getGatewaysList()
    org.bonitasoft.engine.identity.User.getManagerUserName()
    As of 6.0 Use User.getManagerUserId() instead FIXME Remove ASAP
    org.bonitasoft.engine.identity.User.getPassword()
    org.bonitasoft.engine.bpm.comment.Comment.getTenantId()
    As of 6.1 use APISession.getTenantId() instead
    org.bonitasoft.engine.operation.LeftOperand.getType()
    As of 6.0 use Operation.getType() instead
    org.bonitasoft.engine.operation.impl.LeftOperandImpl.getType()
    As of 6.0 use Operation.getType() instead
    org.bonitasoft.engine.operation.Operation.getVariableToSet()
    As of 6.0 replaced by Operation.getLeftOperand()
    org.bonitasoft.engine.operation.impl.OperationImpl.getVariableToSet()
    As of 6.0 replaced by OperationImpl.getLeftOperand()
    org.bonitasoft.engine.api.ProcessManagementAPI.removeAllCategoriesFromProcessDefinition(long)
    As of release 6.1, replaced by ProcessManagementAPI.removeCategoriesFromProcessDefinition(long, int, int)
    org.bonitasoft.engine.api.ProcessManagementAPI.removeAllProcessDefinitionsFromCategory(long)
    As of release 6.1, replaced by ProcessManagementAPI.removeProcessDefinitionsFromCategory(long, int, int)
    org.bonitasoft.engine.operation.impl.LeftOperandImpl.setDataName(String)
    As of 6.0 replaced by LeftOperandImpl.setName(String)
    org.bonitasoft.engine.operation.impl.OperationImpl.setVariableToSet(LeftOperand)
    As of 6.0 replaced by OperationImpl.setLeftOperand(LeftOperand)
